name: OpenBuild
fullText:
🚀 With OpenBuild, zero-experience developers took their first step into Web3!

After completing the Monad 101 Bootcamp, co-hosted by Monad(@monad_xyz) and OpenBuild, many developers launched their very first Web3 DApps.

👉 Among them, two mini-games  stood out. To showcase https://t.co/UxpkIz4W5E

name: Box
fullText:

name: Solar (Solana中文社群)
fullText:
恭喜@DonutBrowser完成 700万美金的种子前融资！Donut是首个「自主智能」的加密浏览器，结合人工智能，帮助用户更便捷地与区块链应用交互。

Donut现给Solar社区送出专属福利，48小时的快闪活动：
✅转推
✅关注@Solana_zh @DonutBrowser 
✅留言你最想要的加密浏览器功能

🧧抽3人送出$500U https://t.co/e815aTKqBu
